title: Analyze infographics
prompt: Crop out all the animals, and use them as icons in a matplotlib plot showing the lifespan of those animals. Sort by lifespan.

title: Image overlay
prompt: Analyze where the mug, glass, and bowl will go? Annotate them on the image with boxes and arrows and save the image.

title: Zoom and count
prompt: How many gears are there? Zoom in to see.

title: Zoom and inspect
prompt: What is the number on the gauge? Zoom in if needed.

title: Detailed image understanding
prompt: what is the number on the ESMT chip? zoom and rotate crop if needed.

title: Sorting
prompt: Annotate on the image with arrows of different colors, which object should go into which bin.

title: Plotting
prompt: Make a bar chart of per-category performance, normalize prior SOTA as 1.0 for each task, then take average per-category. Plot using matplotlib with nice style.

title: Counterfactual
prompt: how many fingers are there? Annotate on the image to help reasoning.

title: Draw bounding box
prompt: Find components on it and plot bounding boxes on the image with proper text labels.

title: Counterfactual
prompt: Annotate on this image until you identify issues with this image.

title: Point and label
prompt: Point to at least 50 items in the image in the format of {"point": [y,x], label: ""} and label them in the image with large dot and text
